name: Dorfde Goes To Buy Pepsi DEMO
name_original: Dorfde Goes To Buy Pepsi DEMO
description:
This is a game about a Serbian Teen going to buy Pepsi. However things get a little bit complicated.  The shop you're buying the Pepsi from is all out of Pepsi, there's only one can left and the guy at the cashier has it! In order for you to get that Pepsi you must collect all of cashiers stolen goods and give it back to him!

The game is still a work in progress and I plan on possibly releasing the game sometime in Fall of 2021. Not sure when. I hope y'all enjoy the demo none the less!
